dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, we've got this fascinating list today, right? Of, um, like, the wealthiest people in Korea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, we've got this fascinating list today, right? Of, um, like, the wealthiest people in Korea.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I was just looking at it. It's, uh, pretty incredible, isn't it? The sheer scale of wealth there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I was just looking at it. It's, uh, pretty incredible, isn't it? The sheer scale of wealth there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And, no surprise, right at the top, we've got Lee Kun-hee from Samsung, with a whopping seventeen point three billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And, no surprise, right at the top, we've got Lee Kun-hee from Samsung, with a whopping seventeen point three billion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #1 Lee Kun-hee $17.3 B 78 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Yeah, I mean, Samsung, that's almost a given for Korea's wealthiest. It's like, a dynasty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I mean, Samsung, that's almost a given for Korea's wealthiest. It's like, a dynasty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But then you scroll down a bit, and at number two, we have Seo Jung-jin from biotech, Celltrion. That's, uh, a different vibe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But then you scroll down a bit, and at number two, we have Seo Jung-jin from biotech, Celltrion. That's, uh, a different vibe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? That really caught my eye. Biotech, um, really making huge waves over there, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? That really caught my eye. Biotech, um, really making huge waves over there, apparently.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then, I kept seeing this recurring theme: online games. Kim Jung-ju from Nexon, Kwon Hyuk-bin with Smilegate... it's huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, I kept seeing this recurring theme: online games. Kim Jung-ju from Nexon, Kwon Hyuk-bin with Smilegate... it's huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #3 Kim Jung-ju $9.6 B 52 online games, Nexon #6 Kwon Hyuk-bin $4 B 46 online games, Smilegate Holdings

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's wild how much money is in that sector. Just, uh, like, exploding.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's wild how much money is in that sector. Just, uh, like, exploding.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Even Bom Kim from Coupang, you know, online retail, he's on there too, still a billionaire at forty-one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Even Bom Kim from Coupang, you know, online retail, he's on there too, still a billionaire at forty-one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #31 Bom Kim $1 B 41 online retailing, Coupang

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wow, yeah. And, um, the ages are really varied too, from, like, late forties all the way up to eighties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow, yeah. And, um, the ages are really varied too, from, like, late forties all the way up to eighties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Age #1 Lee Kun-hee 78 ... #8 Mong-Koo Chung 82 ... #11 Euisun Chung 49

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like Euisun Chung, he's only 49 from Hyundai. It's, uh, quite a mix of old money and new tech.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like Euisun Chung, he's only forty nine from Hyundai. It's, uh, quite a mix of old money and new tech.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #11 Euisun Chung $1.95 B 49 Hyundai, Hyundai Motor

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Really shows the diverse ways people are, like, building empires there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Really shows the diverse ways people are, like, building empires there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's, um, quite the snapshot of the Korean economy, wouldn't you say?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's, um, quite the snapshot of the Korean economy, wouldn't you say?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Makes you wonder what's next for some of these industries, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Makes you wonder what's next for some of these industries, doesn't it?
